name: Campus Notes - forget me not.
description: A novel game set in the University of Tsukuba. Play as Yuta Kiriha and join the group "Bertha's Knights" to solve a mysterious case of being forgotten every day.

reviews.review_text: Best... Visual Novel I have ever played. The art style of this VN was just beautiful.
EVERYONE BUY THE GAME. WE NEED THE 2000 COPY STRETCH GOAL.  and yes I know, my cover image is from Campus Notes.

It was a good read. Each choice didn't make dramatic changes to the story by itself. Depending on your tastes, the characters and their interactions can be really enjoyable. Also, depending on how much you emphasize on logical aspect of the game, you might get turned off by some ridiculous occurences or story backgrounds. If you're really flexible, like I am, you probably wouldn't mind them, as the explanations given don't sound too much like excuses. If you're looking for something not too complex and not too serious and would like to enjoy a good read and a simple mystery, this can be a good choice.
